display_long_description:
Tag before Dawn is **the first game combine asymmetric horror and full‑body movement**. Besides the thrilling deadly chases, the battle of wits is even more crucial!

Players are divided into two factions: one plays as a powerful killer, while the others become vulnerable survivors.

Join our community here: **https://discord.com/invite/TagBeforeDawn**


>
>
>
